alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Laurens; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 8:39AM EDT until August 10 at 9:15AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL LAURENS...SOUTHEASTERN CHEROKEE AND UNION COUNTIES... At 838 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles south of Gaffney to 13 miles southwest of Union, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Union, Monarch Mill, Buffalo, Jonesville, Carlisle, Rose Hill State Park, Cross Keys, Saratt, Sedalia and Adamsburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
